website_summaries.verdict: It looks like a throwback but performs with modern ease and functionality.
pros: Simplifies the art of mixing with just a few speed settings
Loyal customers of the brand highlight this mixer's effectiveness
cons: Not the most powerful option, but does accomplish most mixing tasks

website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you need a basic hand mixer for simple baking projects.
pros: Perfect for the person who is looking for a back-to-basics, no-frills, low-cost, 3-speed hand mixer
Whips up cookie dough and frosting with no problem
cons: Doesn't last as long as other items on the list

customer_reviews.title: No slow speed, not usable
customer_reviews.text: The reviews that there is no slow speed are correct. At level 1, this thing will spit stuff all over the place. It's super powerful for an inexpensive hand blender, so if that is what you need, yes, get this. It will cut up cold butter easily. Edit 4/9/2014: Got the Kitchen Aid 9 Speed mixer and the video I uploaded shows the dramatic difference in slow speeds. I absolutely love the KA mixer by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: Really Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it on mid-June as my hand mixer malfunctioned. And, I needed a new one to prepare a birthday cake for my wife. And when I ordered it, they provided me with a delivery date prior to my wife's birth date. But they kept on changing the delivery date and the product finally arrived on 7th July past my wife's birthday. I was really disappointed as I couldn't bake a cake for her (which I have been baking on her every birthday). And after arrival when I tried using, quality-wise it wasn't even close to the one that I was previously using. My recommendation is don't fall for this product's false advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Sudip Subedi

customer_reviews.title: Best one around!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little dream machine is exactly what I have been needing. I have had so many mixers and those mixers just flung stuff all over the place. This one mixes just right at 3 different speed and does NOT fling stuff every where. I am so glad to have it. This price was just right too! I am really happy with my purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Treadway

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've easily whipped cold butter with this hand mixer. I've used it for 2 years now and I haven't had any issues. It's very easy to clean because the beaters don't have flat sides.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Great Hand Mixer
customer_reviews.text: Great hand mixer. My second one. The first lasted 7 years so I can not complain. Easy to use for simple mixing. I use the big Kitchen Aid Mixer for heavy duty receipts. Fast Shipping ! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A.

customer_reviews.title: Every kitchen needs something red
customer_reviews.text: Was offered a free, heavy duty Kitchenaid stand mixer and turned it down in favor of this. Why? Because if I get one more counter top appliance, I will have to knock out a wall and add a bump out onto my kitchen. No more counter top space! This little item fits nicely into a drawer. So, I saved approx. $30,000. Besides, I like the red color.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mixer for less than 3 years. I probably have used it less than 20 times. While it worked, it was very good - powerful. While mixing cookie dough this year, it died on me. I feel that a hand mixer should last more than 3 years and more than 20 times used. I am very disappointed especially because it's a Cuisinart. I checked reviews before I bought it, and really felt I had made a good purchase. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy L.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps on going!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mixer for a while now, and I still love it. It is sleek red and powerfull! It makes whipping up mashed potatoes so easy. Everything is easier when you have good quality tools!
customer_reviews.author: Leopardess Moon

customer_reviews.title: Great mixer for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great mixer, lasted 3.5 years and still works but now sounds like it has rocks in the motor so I figure it's just a matter of time. Still a great mixer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great Mixer...A Chef's Opinion
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little mixer. It has all of the quality and power you expect from Cuisinart but does not command a large price tag. I am a professional chef and I purchased this for my home. For people complaining about the high power of the machine, I would suggest hand whipping for light low speed mixes. It comes with booth beaters and a nice little plastic spatula. Honestly you cant go wrong with Cuisinart and this proves it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W

customer_reviews.title: the only one we ever buy!
customer_reviews.text: After 50 years of cooking and baking and using every appliance on the market this is my favorite. And the only one that does exactly what it says it does in my opinion. It lasts a long time. I would never be without this mixer. Thanks Amazon for selling it I didnt even have to leave home to get it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Slings mix consistently.
customer_reviews.text: This mixer slings mix above the bowl. I have tried everything since i purchased in April to make it not sling mix but have been unsuccessful. It’s low setting is very aggressive. Will find another one.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Jernigan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works great, but the on/off/speed switch needs to be moved. The thing is always accidentally being turned off while in use. The switch is right at the top where you grip the mixer and too easily gets switched off. Other than that it is a good little mixer for the price. It can easily be used for small jobs if you aren't into baking items that have a "stiff dough". I am a mom and do some baking (cookies, gingerbread houses on occasion, and such) and this fits our household just right.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Frisbey

customer_reviews.title: Nice but slow speed is very fast
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other reviews I read stating that the 1st speed (the lowest speed) is very fast. So if you're just starting to mix something, the ingredients fly out. I think the solution is just to stir it with the beaters by hand first and then turn them on. Ideally, the 1st speed would be slower. But otherwise it's very smart looking and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: IT DID NOT LAST VERY LONG
customer_reviews.text: THIS MIXER QUIT WORKING IT STARTS AND STOPS THE BEATERS STOP AND WONT TURN
customer_reviews.author: DEB

customer_reviews.title: As soon as this arrived I put in the beaters ...
customer_reviews.text: As soon as this arrived I put in the beaters and plugged it in. Within seconds it blew the CFGI. I tried another outlet, on a different breaker, it did the same thing. I immediately put it back in the box and am returning it. 4 days before Thanksgiving, this isn't considered convenient. I think I'll be trying a different brand/model.
customer_reviews.author: melis4806

customer_reviews.title: Not awesome...
customer_reviews.text: My current hand mixer only has three speed settings and the lowest one is still crazy and flings stuff everywhere. I bought this one in the hopes that the lowest setting would actually be a low speed...it is not. Also the regular beaters this mixer comes with are no good. They're very thin. Overall, I'm not impressed with this hand mixer.
customer_reviews.author: C.R.L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice hand mixer
customer_reviews.text: It feels a bit cheap in the hand, but it looks quite nice. The mixer has plenty of power and has tackled everything I've put in front of it so far. I do wish there were a lower speed setting, because all of the settings seem to be quite fast. Overall, for an inexpensive mixer, this one performs well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sturchio

customer_reviews.title: Little but mighty!
customer_reviews.text: Powerful little machine! I bought a betty crocker one a year ago and the motor blew out, so I wanted something a bit more heavy duty. It is a little heavy, but you can tell it's metal and will last longer than the plastic betty crocker one. I love it! And the color is just so fun, matches my red and black kitchen. Great for baking cakes, cookies, breads. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: sp-latter
customer_reviews.text: The low speed on this thing still will send your dry ingredients flying. Make sure to use a deep bowl or only use for mashed potatoes or something less powdery. I really wanted an alternative to huge bowl mixer, but this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Hip teacher

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my son
customer_reviews.text: Finally a gift he likes and actually uses! He kept having me bring my mixer over when we had dinner at his house and that got old. I bought this for him last Christmas and now I don't have to wait for him to ask for me to bring mine over. It is stylish and has the quality you'd expect from Cuisinart.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a little less than 3 years. Then a gear stripped and one of the beaters does not turn.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brozek

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these and it's fantastic. The speeds are perfect, the weight/size is perfect. Just a really great product!
customer_reviews.author: Viki Fratelli

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My old mixer took a dump and Cuisinart has always been a dependable product in my house so I decided to give it a try. I'm not a fancy baker, just a baker and this mixer does the job. It's a little fast on the low speeds but it works and I love red!
customer_reviews.author: LVJ

customer_reviews.title: Like the looks
customer_reviews.text: Like the looks. Also have an awesome Kitchen Aide stand mixer for heavy duty stuff. The Cuisinart did a great job at all speeds. As always when using a mixer .... use a deep bowl for mixing and there is no mess.
customer_reviews.author: GBE

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart Hand Mixer
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this mixer the first time I used it. Low on this Cuisinart mixer has more power than my old one did on high. I also like the retro look and was happy with all the color choices available too
customer_reviews.author: Patti S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: cheap blender that does the job, what else can ...
customer_reviews.text: cheap blender that does the job, what else can you say about a blender. I use it to mix "20 minute" drywall mud.
customer_reviews.author: REO Capital

customer_reviews.title: ... baker here but needed a new one after $5 crappy one broke
customer_reviews.text: Not an avid baker here but needed a new one after $5 crappy one broke. This thing is VERY powerful. It is heavier than I expected, but appears to be a good quality. Only thing I wash is that the lowest power setting was not so powerful
customer_reviews.author: sbettencourt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. I have only used the lowest speed and even that speed is fast. I should have purchased this a long time ago. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Opoku-Agyemang

customer_reviews.title: my usage is minimal and this had mixer is perfect for that
customer_reviews.text: my usage is minimal and this had mixer is perfect for that. my cousin has been using the same mixer for quite some time now and she too is pleased with this mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mixer
customer_reviews.text: Love this mixer. Use it for my camper and it's been used for several different recipes. Has lots of power and didn't seem to struggle getting the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Cebula

customer_reviews.title: Cuisnart CHM-3R hand mixer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hand mixer. Plenty of power. The beaters seem a little light but this thing can really get with it. if you don't need many mixing speeds, this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: recommend
customer_reviews.text: have only used it a few times since i have had it but am very pleased with it. it is kinda of fast for the first speed but if you know what you are doing then you should be able to use it without making a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good design great speed
customer_reviews.text: Nice design great speed .. It worked excellent for my home made tamales
customer_reviews.author: Horacio Quintana

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and compact!
customer_reviews.text: All of the above features make it a great mixer!
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie M.

customer_reviews.title: This mixer really does the job
customer_reviews.text: Another fine product from Cuisinart well built, sturdy, and inexpensive. Although my old mixer was such a POS it's hard to give a fair assessment.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Tharp

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. I bought this mixer and it only lasted less than a year with normal use. The blades of the beaters bent and it would no longer work after that. Don't buy this product!!
customer_reviews.author: fathermary

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I love this handy mixer. Lightweight and yet it gets the job done quickly and easily. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: I like this mixer
customer_reviews.text: I like this mixer. I deducted a star, because the lowest setting, really is too powerful to be considered low. I've learned how to make it work for my purposes however, so I'm okay with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love my mixer speed is the best used it to make my cake. Perfect price and all.
customer_reviews.author: Lilbit’s Creations

customer_reviews.title: Snazzy red!
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks of this mixer, but it also works well. It's very quite, and I did try mixing a stick of butter straight from the fridge, and it really does work. Easy to clean and operate.
customer_reviews.author: SarCar

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and used several times so far. Runs great. A little difficult to figure out which paddle goes in which one but not a major deal but hard to see on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: B Nunes

customer_reviews.title: Best ever !
customer_reviews.text: Best mixer ever ! Better than my expensive KitchenAid and way less bulky!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have had better luck with the cheap ones
customer_reviews.text: I received this mid September in 2017. It is now November 23, 2017 and the mixer locked up. I have only used it 4 or 5 times. Was making buttercream frosting. So in my opinion, it is not worth the price. I have had better luck with the cheap ones. I bought one for $15 that lasted several years and I made a lot of frosting with it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia tippett

customer_reviews.title: I was happily right! Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a red hand mixer to go with my kitchen, and figured I couldn't do wrong with a Cuisinart. I was happily right! Does the job, no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Neyney

customer_reviews.title: Great hand mixer
customer_reviews.text: Not too heavy with plenty of power. I have a KitchenAid stand mixer, but when I have a small mixing job this mixer is so convenient. Love the color.
customer_reviews.author: seagull

customer_reviews.title: Great mixer for the money!
customer_reviews.text: It was a lot more powerful than I expected for that price. Not the nicest mixer out there, but a great steal for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: I love this mixer
customer_reviews.text: I love this mixer. I bought it to replace an old one. I like the retro look. Does a great job for what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Hammons

customer_reviews.title: Mixes alot
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. I make cupcakes for my coworkers birthdays and for other parties. So I need a hand mixer that will do the job. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: 2CHATTY

customer_reviews.title: Ready to mix.
customer_reviews.text: Great hand mixer. Just what my daughter in law wanted. Compact and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: clekien

customer_reviews.title: Good mixer except......
customer_reviews.text: Have had this mixer for 3 yrs. It still works great. The only thing that I don't like is that it needs a lower speed. The lowest speed is more like a medium or high speed.
customer_reviews.author: Carola

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and functional!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. The color is great and it works for my baking and cooking needs. Takes up almost no space either.
customer_reviews.author: JSML

customer_reviews.title: plastic construction
customer_reviews.text: I expected a little more. It is very lightweight. Looks great. If you want a fashion mixer, for occasional use, go for it. i
customer_reviews.author: Davo

customer_reviews.title: Great small mixer.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size - perfect for small kitchen and not-sophisticated chef.
customer_reviews.author: David Robinson

customer_reviews.title: ... not used item yet but appears to be a good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used item yet but appears to be a good purchase ..
customer_reviews.author: Tim Victor

customer_reviews.title: Heed my warning and do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This mixer is insanely heavy (what did they put inside this thing!?) - so heavy, that if I'm mixing something thick, sometimes I'll have to pause to put it down and take a break. As other reviewers have noted, there is NO low/slow speed - you have FAST, FASTER and FASTEST only. The placement of the button that changes speed it also terrible, as you inadvertently bump it while using the item and change the speed without meaning to. I hate hate hate this mixer and wish I would have spent the extra money on the Kitchen Aid.
customer_reviews.author: M. Minier

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product, only wish it had a slower speed option.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous79

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to give as gift so can't say how well it works. Appears to be substantial so I'm hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old Cuisinart hand mixer that died on us. I am sure I'll get many years of service from this one too.
customer_reviews.author: WeezyG

customer_reviews.title: Much better than Kitchen Aid
customer_reviews.text: Love this mixer. It's way more powerful than the Kitchen Aid mixer I owned previously. The only criticism I have would be that the slowest setting is still quite fast, but that's a very minor issue to me. Use a large enough bowl and your good to go. The red color is more of a burgundy. Great buy. Always love Cuisinart products.
customer_reviews.author: D. Young

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this mixer looks, and I've used it for everything from meringue to cookie dough. My only regret is that I didn't buy one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Yokohama Mama

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for his birthday. We were a little concerned about mashing potatoes but no problems at all. Works like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: gifts
customer_reviews.text: Can not go wrong with a cuisinart mixer. It was well worth the giant smile in return. Cuisinart can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Petls

customer_reviews.title: would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement is working good lime the red color
customer_reviews.author: klb

customer_reviews.title: Fine hand muxer
customer_reviews.text: Could have used one speed lower, but does the job! Like that it stands up when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: pat kent

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean the beaters
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. Powerful. Easy to clean the beaters.
customer_reviews.author: Airplay user

customer_reviews.title: Works great and I love the style
customer_reviews.text: Some reviewers said it was too powerful, but I think it works great. I'm quite happy with the purchase and I'm glad I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Now I just need to buy myself one.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom for Christmas and she LOVES it! Works great. It is Cuisinart quality. The speeds are perfect and the color is fun.
customer_reviews.author: Margeaux

customer_reviews.title: Egg beater
customer_reviews.text: Nice but one beater won't stay in. Can I get z replacement beater?
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Nice price , great product ,I would recommend to anyone who likes to bake, simple to use , easy o clean
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has all the power I need and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Dynaflowhum

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCE
customer_reviews.text: MY WIFE LOVES IT. VERY GOOD PRICE AND DEPENDABLE. AND THE COLOR IS VERY PLEASING BRAND NAME FOR GOOD PRICE
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD LAROSA

customer_reviews.title: This is a lot better quality mixer than our previous one
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot better quality mixer than our previous one. It has good power and the 3-speed feature helps to keep stuff from splashing all over the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene J. Handl

customer_reviews.title: Great Handheld!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mixer. Love the easy to clean beaters and the red color! It is lightweight and the speeds are perfect for a handheld, very powerful. I find myself using it more than my stand mixer now.
customer_reviews.author: rhondave

customer_reviews.title: Powerful small mixer
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice strong mixer. I can whip egg whites in a few minutes. It works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Swearingen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price for a real work horse hand mixer
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price for a real work horse hand mixer. If my daughter hadn't dropped the last one, it would have been 10 yrs. old and still working great! Now I have a snazzy red one. Still excellent product. And, I cook a lot. Great for a variety of projects when you don't feel like pulling out the stand mixer.
customer_reviews.author: LVLV1958

customer_reviews.title: seems like it will be durable
customer_reviews.text: very cute and it works well, seems like it will be durable, which is what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Ulam

customer_reviews.title: Disposable
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 19 months. A decent unit but probably underpowered with what appears to be many plastic parts that have a limited lifespan. We have a counter top mixer for the hard stuff and this mixer still didn't last.
customer_reviews.author: M. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Just Fine
customer_reviews.text: For our needs which does not include a lottttt of baking it works as expected. speeds seem to be o.k. not as others have stated to fast or to slow.
customer_reviews.author: roy l.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mixer. The speeds are super fast. I am getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: A. O'C

customer_reviews.title: Great starter mixer
customer_reviews.text: For a first time mixer owner, nothing beats this fella. It's powerful, lightweight and durable. The blades are not ideal for tougher ingredients, like potato, so you'll need to upgrade to sharper blades for certain recipes (they're not included with the mixer). A great product.
customer_reviews.author: scott hazleton

customer_reviews.title: cuisinart hand mixer
customer_reviews.text: love this mixer it does exactly what I expexted it to do.. I have natural hair and I got this to mix my shea butter/essential oils mixtures and it does just that making my hair smoothie light and fluffy!! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Meeks929

customer_reviews.title: ... it a couple times of light use but I like it. Pros- looks modern
customer_reviews.text: Only used it a couple times of light use but I like it. Pros- looks modern, stainless steel attachments, price. Con- low speed is a bit fast but not a big deal
customer_reviews.author: Mark Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very efficient and effective kitchen tool. A little on the heavy side.
customer_reviews.author: roland bernard

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Slowest speed is too fast...regardless of how deep the bowl, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Holleigh Seales

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hand mixer for my sister as a Christmas gift and she loves it. I have to say, I am very pleased with this purchase and I think that the price was perfect. I searched multiple websites and the price of this product was the best. I definitely will make future purchases with Amazon.......
customer_reviews.author: Meechiko79

customer_reviews.title: Just need average mixer, only use 4 or 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Just need average mixer, only use 4 or 5 times a year -- hope it will last for the next 10 years. Lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: JERRY NIELSEN

customer_reviews.title: I love the color!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color! Works really well, no problems have used it several times so far! Really nice product :)
customer_reviews.author: Jenniferbyk

customer_reviews.title: so I love this mixer
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it, so I love this mixer. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: R. M. SCOLLIN

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: The blades are thinner than other mixers and were very easy to clean. The 3 speeds are great! Love the red option!
customer_reviews.author: Redcat

customer_reviews.title: great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: has a lot of power for hand mixer. very pleased with the machine. i love the look and it was a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Tarheel4Life

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my mother. She said it was just what she was wanting.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Not enough slower speeds
customer_reviews.text: I tried mixing a little flour into a box cake mix, before adding the wet ingredients, because I live in a high altitude area, and the slowest speed on this mixer was a little too fast. I had it coming out of the mixing bowl. I'll learn to use it, I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Adelina M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For a basic hand mixer, this one is a keeper
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: The mixer quality I think is fair. The low speed is to fast for "mixing". It needs (1) slower speed. I guess you get what you pay for on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Quisanart Hand Mixer CHM 3R
customer_reviews.text: Not being an expert mixer I thought the mixer did an admirable job, just one use thus far. The beaters clean easily without any scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: BruceinCC

customer_reviews.title: Great Hand Mixer
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a "retro" hand mixer & found this one. This mixer works great & looks beautiful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.&Mrs.Will

customer_reviews.title: Returned :(
customer_reviews.text: With first use, developed a burning odor that did not disappear !! It seemed to over heat with minimal use!! I expected much better quality from Cuisinart !! Very disappointed !! Great return policy Amazon !!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Mixer
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful mixer, quick, easy to use and clean, used it quite a lot and found nothing I don't like about it. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: My previous one smells burning when it works. This one is much more powerful, and no unhappy odor comes out. Like it.
customer_reviews.author: Zl

product_meta.title: Cuisinart CHM-3R Electronic Hand Mixer 3-Speed, Red
product_meta.description: Color:RedThe Cuisinart PowerSelect 3-Speed Hand Mixer offers 220 Watts of power and enough speed settings to mix just about anything that needs mixing. Features: 220 watts of power with automatic feedback|Easy-to-use speed control and beater eject button|Exclusive swivel cord for right-handed or left-handed use|Extra-long self-cleaning beaters with no center posts|Spatula|Instruction/Recipe book|Limited 3-year warranty|BPA Free
feature_bullets: 220 watts of power with automatic feedback cuts through cold sticks of butter
Easy to use speed control and beater eject button
Exclusive swivel cord for right handed or left-handed use
Extra long self cleaning beaters with no center posts
Now available in red and white

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars375 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
